name: SteamWorld Dig 2
description: SteamWorld Dig is back! Dig deep, gain riches and unearth the terrors of the underworld in this platform mining adventure influenced by classic Metroidvania style games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz, SSE2 support Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible, 512 MB video memory, framebuffer object support. E.g. Intel HD 4600 or better. Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: You may need to update your graphics drivers for OpenGL 2.1 support.
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 / Radeon 7870 or better.
